questions.item1: If 3x + 2y = 12 and 2x - y = 3, what is the value of x + y?
questions.item3: A system of equations is given as y = 2x + 5 and y = -3x - 10. What is the value of x in their solution?
questions.item4: The quadratic equation x^2 + 5x + k = 0 has exactly one solution. What is the value of k?
questions.item5: If f(x) = 3x^2 - 5x + 7 and g(x) = x - 2, what is the value of f(g(3))?
questions.item6: The function h(x) = 4x^3 - 2x is transformed by shifting 3 units down and 2 units left. What is the new function h(x)?
questions.item7: If x^2 - 4x + 3 = 0, what is the sum of the roots?
questions.item9: What is the solution to the inequality 2x - 3 > 5?
questions.item10: If 2x + 5y = 20 and y = 2x, what is the value of x?
questions.item12: If the product of two numbers is 56 and their sum is 15, what is the smaller number?
questions.item13: A function f(x) is defined as f(x) = 2x^2 + 3x - 4. What is f(-3)?
questions.item14: What are the roots of the equation 4x^2 - 12x + 9 = 0?
questions.item15: If x and y satisfy the equation x + y = 12 and xy = 35, what is the value of x^2 + y^2?
questions.item17: If f(x) = x^2 + 4x - 5, for what value of x does f(x) = 0?
questions.item18: The equation x^2 - 7x + 12 = 0 is graphed. What is the x-coordinate of its vertex?
questions.item19: What is the smallest value of k for which x^2 + 2x + k has no real solutions?
questions.item21: The function f(x) = 3x^2 - 2x + 7 is shifted 4 units up and 3 units right. What is the new function?
questions.item22: What is the solution set for the equation 4/(x+2) = 2?
questions.item23: If x - 1 is a factor of the polynomial x^3 - 3x^2 + 5x - 3, what is the value of f(1)?
questions.item24: If the line y = 3x + 7 is perpendicular to the line y = mx - 5, what is the value of m?
questions.item25: What is the remainder when the polynomial x^3 - 4x^2 + x - 6 is divided by x - 2?
questions.item27: If f(x) = 2x^2 - x + 1, what is f(3)?
questions.item28: The equation x^2 - 8x + k = 0 has one real solution. What is the value of k?
questions.item29: If the function f(x) = ax + b passes through the points (2, 4) and (5, 10), what is the value of a?
questions.item31: A system of equations is given as 2x + y = 5 and 3x - 2y = 4. What is the solution (x, y)?
questions.item32: If f(x) = x^2 - 6x + 8, what is the x-intercept of the function?
questions.item33: If the sum of two numbers is 12 and their product is 35, what are the two numbers?
questions.item35: What is the vertex of the parabola defined by the equation y = x^2 + 4x - 7?
questions.item36: If the roots of the equation x^2 + 6x + k = 0 are equal, what is the value of k?
questions.item38: If a and b are the roots of the quadratic equation x^2 - 4x + 3 = 0, what is the value of ab?
questions.item39: What is the sum of the roots of the quadratic equation 3x^2 - 7x + 4 = 0?
questions.item40: What is the y-intercept of the line 2x + 3y = 12?
